Equality, Diversity & Inclusion

We believe that equality, diversity and inclusion are fundamental to creating a positive, collaborative and forward-thinking culture.

At Green Orbit Digital, we recognise that diverse perspectives drive stronger ideas, more innovative solutions, and a more resilient organisation. By creating an environment where everyone belongs, we empower our team to do their best work and ensure our impact benefits the communities and industries we serve.

Our approach to Equality, Diversity and Inclusion (EDI) is grounded in openness, transparency, and continuous improvement. We aim to build a team that reflects the diversity of the UK and the global space, technology and sustainability communities.

EDI is not a box-ticking exercise—it is a fundamental part of who we are and how we work.

Our Commitments

  • Embedding EDI principles into our culture, policies, and ways of working.
  • Recruiting talented individuals from all backgrounds and enabling them to thrive.
  • Celebrating individuality as part of a strong, collaborative and diverse team.
  • Encouraging partners and collaborators to uphold inclusive practices.
  • Sharing best practice and continually improving our approach.

Our Inclusive Culture

Our workplace is shaped by openness, collaboration, and the belief that all voices should be heard. We maintain this through regular company-wide updates, open feedback channels, and internal communities that help shape our direction.

We support a range of employee-led affinity groups—including networks for parents, women in tech, mental health awareness, and early-career professionals. These groups champion initiatives and ensure our EDI culture is lived, not just stated.

Our year-round EDI and wellbeing programme includes celebrations and learning opportunities around events such as International Women’s Day, Pride, National Inclusion Week, and Black History Month. Through workshops, talks, and shared learning, we strengthen awareness across the organisation.

We also believe in connection and community—through social events, volunteering, sports groups, film clubs, and shared interests that bring our team together.

Inclusive Career Development

We’re building a workplace where everyone can advance confidently. Our Manager Academy ensures leaders across the organisation foster inclusive, supportive environments. Our training programmes reflect diverse learning styles so everyone can grow in the way that suits them best.

We actively remove bias from our development and promotion processes by ensuring a consistent, transparent framework for progression. We also support apprenticeships and early-career pathways as part of our long-term commitment to a diverse pipeline of talent.

Disability Confident

We are a Disability Confident Committed Level 1 employer. We work proactively to ensure our environment, processes, and culture are accessible and supportive for disabled people and colleagues with long-term health conditions.

Our commitments include widely promoting vacancies, offering interviews to disabled applicants who meet the minimum criteria, and anticipating reasonable adjustments during recruitment and employment.

The UK’s Disability Confident programme encourages employers to champion accessibility and rethink traditional approaches to recruitment, retention, and development.

Our Gender, Equity, Diversity & Inclusion Plan

Our team represents more than 40 nationalities, bringing together a rich diversity of experience, perspectives and expertise. Our Gender, Equity, Diversity and Inclusion (GEDI) plan is a living document—updated annually to reflect new learning, evolving expectations and our commitment to continual improvement.

Read the Plan

Building a More Inclusive Future

We’re committed to creating a workplace—and an industry—where everyone can thrive.

Get in Touch
Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
